David Letterman asked about Bieber's schooling and found out that he's currently in the 11th grade. "11th grade-- is that a sophomore in high school?" David Letterman asked, to which Bieber replied: I don't know. I'm Canadian. Later Bieber tweeted that he will be on the "Late Show" again on Friday, "playing the drums and doing the Top Ten."
